attributes.action: Remove sadiq Khan London mayor from office
attributes.background: Since sadiq Khan has been London mayor knife crime has gone up so has rape so has murder, and general crime,he is also putting our relationship with America at risk,this man has defended terrorist that killed Londoners he is not fit to be mayor of our capital

rejection.details: The Mayor of London is elected by the people of London, not appointed by the UK Government or Parliament.
